title: Use distinct slider vs gallery images and restyle Services + Training Environment sections

requirements.text: Update the landing page slider so it uses a dedicated set of slider images that are different from the images used in the Training Environment gallery (no shared filenames/assets between the slider and gallery).

quotes: images in slide bar and images in gallery are should different

acceptanceCriteria: Landing slider images in frontend/src/components/landing/LandingSlider.tsx do not reference any of the gallery image filenames used in frontend/src/components/landing/GallerySection.tsx.
Slider still auto-rotates and navigation arrows + dot indicators continue to work.
All slider images have appropriate English alt text.

requirements.text: Add the new dedicated slider images as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated and reference them from the slider component.

quotes: images in slide bar and images in gallery are should different

acceptanceCriteria: All newly generated slider images exist in frontend/public/assets/generated with the exact filenames specified in this build request.
LandingSlider.tsx references the new filenames and renders without broken images (no 404s).

requirements.text: Change the visual style of the Services section (frontend/src/components/landing/ServicesSection.tsx) to a noticeably different, more polished presentation while keeping the existing four services (icons, titles, descriptions) unchanged.
acceptanceCriteria: Service titles, descriptions, and icons remain exactly the same strings/icons as before.
The section has clearly updated styling (layout/spacing/typographic hierarchy/card presentation) compared to the current implementation.
No regressions in responsive layout (4-column on large screens, 2-column on small/medium).

requirements.text: Change the visual style of the Training Environment section (frontend/src/components/landing/GallerySection.tsx) to a noticeably different, more polished gallery presentation while keeping the same 9 gallery images and the section title text unchanged.

quotes: change style services , training environment sections

acceptanceCriteria: The section heading remains "Training Environment" and gallery still displays 9 images.
Gallery styling is updated (e.g., image tile treatment, spacing, hover/interaction, container styling) without changing the image sources.
No regressions in responsive behavior (1 column on very small screens, 2 columns on small, 3 columns on large).

constraints: Do not modify files in frontend immutablePaths (e.g., frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts(x), frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui).
nonGoals: No changes to contact form behavior, Internet Identity authentication, or admin functionality.
No new features like lightbox/modals unless explicitly required by the style changes.

required: Wide training banner photo, modern classroom scene (truevolts-slider-1.dim_1600x600.jpg)
Wide lab/workshop photo with students coding (truevolts-slider-2.dim_1600x600.jpg)
Wide technology training lab interior photo (truevolts-slider-4.dim_1600x600.jpg)
